Referrals FAQ

How can I become an affiliate?

Geekchange lets you exchange cryptocurrency in a fast and secure way. Just sign up for a new account on geekchange.com, choose a cryptocurrency you would like to exchange, and click the "Exchange now" button. Afterward, enter the address of your digital wallet and wait for a bit. In several minutes, the exchanged coins will arrive in your wallet.

Afterward, enter the address of your digital wallet and wait for a bit. In several minutes, the exchanged coins will arrive in your wallet.
